summary: The Tariff Revenue Used to Secure Tomorrow Act (TRUST Act) establishes the Tariff Trust Fund in the Treasury.  If the U.S. maintains a budget deficit in 2026 and the following year, excess tariff revenue collected compared to 2025 is deposited into the Fund.  These funds are then transferred to the general fund for deficit reduction. The Act takes effect on the date of enactment, applying to duties collected on or after October 1, 2025.
